channel.title: Nps's stats
channel.description: How can I reduce the stats of my NPC? Like I spawned a few goblins and they hit constant 20(200) and they have really high hitpoint, same thing happens for a lot of the npc's I spawn(man/farmer/skeleton). I cant find any guide about this anywhere. anyone knows how to reduce they're stats?

item.title: Nps's stats
item.dc:creator: @dragoonic dragoonic
item.description:
@dragoonic wrote:

How can I reduce the stats of my NPC? Like I spawned a few goblins and they hit constant 20(200) and they have really high hitpoint, same thing happens for a lot of the npc’s I spawn(man/farmer/skeleton). I cant find any guide about this anywhere. anyone knows how to reduce they’re stats?
